episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Cariboo Voices & Local News
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Cariboo Voices & Local News.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [XDA Developers] Linux 7.0 may receive a self-repairing feature that automatically fixes your XFS filesystem and [Hackaday] R2D2 Gets New Brains, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into cariboo voices & local news, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
